rules_text:
When Dour Chorister enters, create two 1/1 black Vampire Actor creature tokens with lifelink.
Legacy {4}{B} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its legacy cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, create a 1/1 black Vampire Actor creature token with lifelink.
